title.zh: 线上：中文中期报告发布

description.zh: 左钰洁综合现有的调查分析，发布一份中文中期报告。这份报告系统梳理了前期开展的各项调查研究成果，深入分析了中国血友病女性群体的现状和需求，为后续工作的深入开展提供了重要的数据支撑和理论基础，标志着血友病女性关爱研究工作进入新的阶段。
description.en: Yujie (Ruby) Zuo comprehensively analyzed existing surveys and released a Chinese interim report. This report systematically reviews the results of various survey studies conducted in the early stage, deeply analyzes the current situation and needs of Chinese female hemophilia groups, provides important data support and theoretical foundation for the in-depth development of subsequent work, and marks that hemophilia women's care research has entered a new stage.

title.zh: 微信公众号：中期报告全文
